channel.title: Colin Turbett on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Colin Turbett on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Talking Social Work: Colin Turbett
item.description: CT - Colin Turbett CT Thanks very much folks and it’s a privilege to be here at the first of these talking social work sessions and I certainly hope it’s something that will continue, it’s fantastic to see such large numbers interested in something like this. The reason I’m here tonight is because a result of a commission from Iriss, I’ve written this, now it was a collaborative effort and in a sense the story of this publication which only came off the press yesterday is a bit like the history of community social work which is what I want to talk about tonight and that history over the last fifty years since the 68 Act.
